text:
BAgaqdhEyEqnOpa# dhAvatiq sa EqvainaqM BUti#M gamayati dyAvApRuthiqvyA#mA la#BEta kRuqShamA#NaH pratiqShThAkA#mO diqva EqvAsmai# paqrjanyO# var.Shatiq vya#syAmOSha#dhayO rOhanti saqmarddhu#kamasya saqsyaM Ba#vatyagnIShOqmIyAqmA la#BEtaq yaH kAqmayEqtAnna#vAnannAqdaH syAqmityaqgninaiqvAnnaqmava# rundhEq 
sOmE#nAqnnAdyaq-manna#vAnEqvAnnAqdO Ba#vati sArasvaqtImA la#BEtaq ya - [  ]   9
